Added the new apoplexy release (version 3.11.1) to the Level Editors.

Sixteen additional hacks have been added to CusPop in the Other Useful Tools section: blind mode, copy protection, edges of the level, allow triggering any tile, level 1 crouching start, level 1 music, sword, the skeleton, mirror image, falling exit, falling entry, Jaffar, fix gate drawing bug, fix gate sounds bug, fix infinite down bug, allow multiple exit doors.
